tool_description: What on EARTH is BoJo up to now?? Find out the latest Boris Johnson antics.
name: Boris Johnson
title: Boris Johnson

api_list.name: Get Individual News Source for Boris Johnson
api_list.description: Gets the latest news about Boris Johnson from a specific source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://boris-johnson.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boris-johnson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://boris-johnson.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "boris-johnson.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all latest Boris Johnson news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all news about Boris Johnson from several newspapers
